name: United Arab Emirates
legal_system: Civil Law with Islamic Law influences
authorities: UAE Federal Law No. 5 of 2012 on Combating Cybercrimes
UAE Federal Law No. 1 of 2006 on Electronic Transactions
UAE Federal Law No. 11 of 2008 on Evidence in Civil and Commercial Transactions
notes: Digital evidence must be authenticated by certified forensic experts. Chain of custody must be maintained from collection to presentation.
